Introduction.title: Systems Engineer & Web Developer...
description: I am a Systems Engineering student and currently work in the software development industry. I am passionate about developing digital solutions that are efficient, scalable, and impactful. I enjoy facing technological challenges, continuously learning, and staying updated in an ever-evolving industry.

I am driven by the opportunity to participate in innovative projects and collaborate with dynamic teams to bring ideas to life. I am always on the lookout for new opportunities to continue growing professionally and to contribute my knowledge to the development of digital products.

items.title: Four Parks Colombia
items.description: Application for parking reservations and management.

items.title: Website Usage Manage
items.description: A Google Chrome extension to limit the use of social networks.

items.title: Subdirección para la Juventud (SDIS) - Software Developer
items.details: I contributed to the development of digital solutions for youth-focused initiatives. I worked on web applications, database management, and content platforms, ensuring accessibility and engagement for young audiences.

items.title: Systems Engineering Studies
items.details: Here, I had my first direct approach to the world of programming and software development. I learned the basics of everything I want to specialize in as a software developer.

items.title: First Line of Code
items.details: I wrote my first line of real code (my first 'Hello world!') that started my journey. I thank my good friend Yisus for showing me this world.
